name: puppeteer-proxy-api
description: Proxy API with Puppeteer for scraping

scripts.install: apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget gnupg && wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | apt-key add - && sh -c 'echo "deb [arch=amd64] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-chrome.list' && apt-get update && apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable
